editTopo.py edits file version 1
#
# This file can be used as an argument for editTopo.py --apply
#
# Grid-landmask alignment
# created: Thu Aug  21 2025
# by: minghangli-uni
# For grids generated after `2025.05.15/ocean_hgrid.nc` , generated using: https://github.com/ACCESS-NRI/ocean_model_grid_generator/commit/f95a0c99a32fb1bc51c9d6e400e535780c43ae7e or later,
# the land mask is shifted by +10 indices in j from 1142 to 1152.
# It preserves the wet cells after the grid shift but provides flexibility for layout options and supports half-resolution diagnostics.
# More info can be found here: https://github.com/ACCESS-NRI/ocean_model_grid_generator/issues/5
#
# created: Fri Nov  1 12:56:59 2024
# by: ek4684
# via: editTopo.py /g/data/tm70/ek4684/domain-tools/C-grid-workflow/fill_fraction_0.5/topog_new_fillfraction.nc --overwrite
#
#    i    j  old  new
 1235   747 0.0 65.28469848632812
 1227   744 0.0 56.118499755859375
#
# Edits to remove some wet points on W Africa coast https://github.com/COSIMA/access-om3/issues/252
# created: Tue Jan 14 15:19:25 2025
# by: aek156
# via: /g/data/tm70/ek4684/topogtools/editTopo.py topog.nc
